Just want to compare this without using apply here. I would look like:
override fun valueMap(): Map<String, Any?> {
  val map = mutableMapOf<String, Any?>()
  if (episode.defined) map["episode"] = episode.value
  map["stars"] = stars
  return map
}
well local variable map can collide if there is variable with the same name. To be 100% safe we need use this@
